docs.title: About
docs.text: Started in spring 2020 with basic Creality Ender3 Pro.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: My homelab consists of a Beelink EQ12 running Proxmox.

docs.title: Specs
docs.text:
• CPU: Intel N100
  • RAM: 16GB DDR4
  • OS Storage: 500GB NVMe SSD
  • Data Storage: 960GB SSD

docs.title: TMDB access
docs.text:
src link

Use it for tinyMediaManager

In Terminal 

ip dns static>
Then paste 
add regexp=".*\\.themoviedb\\.org\$" forward-to=9.9.9.9
add regexp=".*\\.tmdb\\.org\$" forward-to=9.9.9.9
add name=tmdb-image-prod.b-cdn.net forward-to=9.9.9.9

Another way

IP --> DNS --> Static

Check example 

put [resolve api.tmdb.org]

put [resolve api.themoviedb.org]

docs.title: About
docs.text: Proxmox delivers powerful, enterprise-grade solutions with full access to all functionality for everyone - highly reliable and secure. The software-defined and open platforms are easy to deploy, manage and budget for.
